name: MCelium (InDev)
description:
MCelium is currently in development, some features might not work or be available, see the feature roadmap here: https://github.com/Ryhon0/MCelium#feature-progress

MCelium is an open-source cross-platfrom gamepad friendly launcher for Minecraft Java and Bedrock Edition with support for downloading and managing mods, resource packs and skins directly in the launcher.

GitHub: https://github.com/Ryhon0/MCelium
